All Classes

Class Description
ClientHandler
The ClientHandler class that is responsible for handling the client's HTTP request and response related.
HTTP_Method
An enum of supported HTTP methods of the server.
HTTPRequest
The HTTPRequest class that handles, parses, and extract all the information related to the client's HTTP request.
HTTPResponse
The HTTPResponse class that handles, parses, and write the HTTP response appropriate to the output steam of the client depending on its HTTP request.
HTTPServer
The main HTTP server class that starts the server and allows for a continuous running and listening to incoming connections by clients.
HTTPServerInformation
This class contains all HTTP information about the server.
Such as: Supported HTTP methods, forbidden directories...
HTTPServerLogger
This class logs all information regarding the server:
Errors, HTTP requests and responses...
MainServerClass
Main class for the Multi Threaded HTTP Web Server.
MEME_TYPES
This class contains all the supported MEME types and allows to determine the correct type based on a resource's file extension.
